testimony.testimony: From this, we could confirm that the victim wrote this name with his right hand.

source.evidence_span: made to be worn on the right hand
source.testimony_span: the victim wrote this name with his right hand
source.explanation: A baseball glove is worn on the weak hand. Since the victim's glove is made to worn on the right hand, it follows that the victim is left-handed, who couldn't have written with their right hand.

testimony.testimony: The only other thing I saw was the banana that fell with the police officer.

source.evidence_span: N/A

testimony.testimony: It must've been 6:45 PM when I made the call.

source.evidence_span: Time of death: 9/6 at 6:28 PM
source.testimony_span: It must've been 6:45 PM when I made the call
source.explanation: There is a 17-minute gap between when the victim died and when the witness called the police, so he did not do so immediately.

testimony.testimony: The defendant attacked and killed a person who, without a doubt, was not fighting back.

source.evidence_span: It is stained with blood splatter and a bullet hole is present in the sleeve.
source.testimony_span: a person who, without a doubt, was not fighting back
source.explanation: The blood and bullet hole on Maya's costume indicae that the victim did in fact fight back by firing a shot.

testimony.testimony: The victim took a shot, but because they were too close, he missed.

source.evidence_span: The robe is otherwise clean.
source.testimony_span: because they were too close
source.explanation: There is no gunpowder burn on the costume, so the shot must not have been fired in a close range.
source.context_span: When something is shot from point blank, a burn area is left around the bullet hole.

testimony.testimony: It was, like, oh my gawd, totally my sister!
So like, the costume is, like, purple, right? The blood totally blended right in.
Like, something really bad had happened at, like, my sister's clinic around then...
She, like, would say things like, "No way am I letting a newb drive my car!"
In the end, I wasn't able to give it to her, so I've still got it in my pocket!

source.evidence_span: N/A
source.testimony_span: I've still got it in my pocket
source.explanation: The ring should not be found by Phoenix if it was indeed kept by the witness.
source.context_span:
Maya:
What's the matter? Did you find something?

Phoenix:
Yeah. Check this out.

Maya:
It's a ring...

Phoenix:
There's something engraved on it... "From T to R"...

Ring put in pocket.

testimony.testimony: There's no way I could mistake someone wearing those three ridiculous symbols!
His silk hat. That black cloak. They were all there!

source.evidence_span: Max's three famous symbols. A silk hat, cloak and white roses
source.testimony_span: His silk hat. That black cloak.
source.explanation: The witness failed to mention one of Max's three symbols.

testimony.testimony: Especially the silk hat! There is no way I could forget seeing the decorations on it!
Thus it would be unrealistic to drop the bust on him. Don't you think?

source.evidence_span: The victim was hunched over this 20 lb. box
source.testimony_span: it would be unrealistic to drop the bust on him
source.explanation: The point marked out by the wooden box would be exactly where the Ringmaster's head is, so it is possible to ascertain its location.

testimony.testimony: It was ripped off of the ninja costume and was found in Mr. Engarde's "hakama".
It was Engarde. Matt Engarde. He was trying to sneak his way out of Juan's room!
So he must've worn that Nickel Samurai costume when he was stabbing poor Juan.

source.evidence_span: Engarde's fingerprints
source.testimony_span: he must've worn that Nickel Samurai costume
source.explanation: Having fingerprints on the knife suggests that the killer cannot be costumed.

testimony.testimony: I felt as though I was about to faint, so I poured myself a glass of juice.
I suppose I must have opened the guitar case... after I knocked the vase over.

source.evidence_span: Bears Corrida's fingerprints.
source.testimony_span: I must have opened the guitar case
source.explanation: The witness left their fingerprints on the wine glass, suggesting they were not wearing gloves. Thus, they should've left fingerprints on the guitar case should they have really opened it.

testimony.testimony: My thoughts were confirmed by the evidence, of course; the button and the knife...
To be honest, I thought he had just fainted or something. So I went to pour him some juice.

source.evidence_span: There is a stab wound on his chest.
source.testimony_span: I thought he had just fainted or something
source.explanation: Anyone noticing the knife stabbing the body would have thought the victim is dead.

testimony.testimony: Of course, when I say "room", I mean Juan Corrida's room!
If I saw it again, I could say for sure, but I think it was some sort of wooden statue.
Adrian Andrews already knew from the very beginning that Juan Corrida was dead!
From the moment I saw him, I thought, "I can trust this person as a client."
The request was for the murder of Juan Corrida and 2 or 3 other small things.
I hardly knew the guy to begin with...
After I shoved him, he... He fell down on top of his cheap umbrella.

source.evidence_span: An umbrella with a bent handle lies open in a distance.
source.testimony_span: He fell down on top of his cheap umbrella.
source.explanation: The photo shows that the umbrella is far away from the victim, not beneath him.

testimony.testimony: Then suddenly... Dougie got all wobbly and just collapsed.
The first time was into the electrical pole. That's when the cable broke.
It's like we were destined to meet in this very courthouse's basement reading room.
So you see, I'm innocent! I wouldn't even know where to get a poison like that!

source.evidence_span: He was a fourth year Pharmacology student
source.testimony_span: I wouldn't even know where to get a poison like that
source.explanation: Since the witness' boyfriend was a Pharmacology student at Ivy University, she would have had asy access to that kind of poison at his lab.

testimony.testimony: That's why we're sure it was Mask☆DeMasque, sir. It fits his M. O. to a T!

source.evidence_span: Supposedly priceless, but has no monetary value.
source.testimony_span: That's why we're sure it was Mask☆DeMasque
source.explanation: The urn has no monetary value so it was not the kind of item that Mask☆DeMasque would normally go after.

testimony.testimony: Thirty minutes later, I used an emergency phone to notify the police!
Unfortunately, the thief grabbed a weapon from the side and... rendered me senseless.
As for my broach, I snagged it on the door handle and it got torn off, that's all!
That evening, around 1 AM, I went to see Mr. Bullard in his office at KB Security.
Suddenly, I was hit on the forehead. After that, I remember being a bit dazed.
Hence, I was actually unable to see the urn for myself until the day of the crime...

source.evidence_span: Take good care of the speckled urn
source.testimony_span: I was actually unable to see the urn for myself until the day of the crime
source.explanation: Mask☆DeMasque could not have known about the speckled pattern of the urn, which were paint stains that did not appear until after the urn had been taken to Lordly Tailor.
source.context_span:
Pearl:
Um, these cute little pink splotches... They said that it's paint... And that they were put on the urn recently!

testimony.testimony: I, Luke Atmey, had no points of contact with the victim whatsoever.
But we figured out who he was pretty quick, and then the investigation went smoothly.
There's no question about it! She very conspicuously put some white powder in there.
The little fidget picked up the cup with his free hand and took a sip.

source.evidence_span: Facing the cup, one can see a lip stain on the front, and a floral looking handle to the right.
source.testimony_span: The little fidget picked up the cup with his free hand and took a sip.
source.explanation: Since the victim was holding the paper in his right hand, his free hand would be his left. However, the photo shows that the user of the coffee up used their right hand based on the relative position of the handle and the stain.

testimony.testimony: And then he used the same hand to pick up the cup. His left hand!
It broke, and the strip of cloth covering the table got completely soaked!

source.evidence_span: There is an intact vase on each table.
source.testimony_span: It broke

testimony.testimony: Like 'aving a large mirror between la tables, for example.
When 'e got word 'e won la lottery, Mon. Elg became very excited.
I 'ad to go along w'iz 'im because... Z'ere was a reason why I could not refuse.

source.evidence_span: The owner of the loan is Tender Lender. The head of Tender Lender loan company.
source.testimony_span: I 'ad to go along w'iz 'im
source.explanation: The witness owes a half million dollar loan from a black-market loan shark Tender Lender owned by Furio Tigre.

testimony.testimony: I was tied up with business in December last year. Spent all'a my time in my office.
I ain't no liar. I never met Glen Elg.
When I opened the door to the joint, I saw one ugly scene.

source.evidence_span: The view from the entrance is obstructed and could only see the patio.
source.testimony_span: When I opened the door to the joint, I saw one ugly scene.
source.explanation: When the witness entered the restaurant, he could not have seen the victim.

testimony.testimony: If that waitress hadn't done what she done, everythin' woulda been over.
Sergeant Hawthorne went to Dusky Bridge at the designated time and met with Mr. Fawles.
It was drizzling that day; unfortunately, it's a little hard to see what's going on.
And right after that, I called the police.
The killer broke into the trunk of the stolen car and hid the body in there.
present: Dusky Bridge Map or Witness's Photo

testimony.testimony: Until I entered college, I had never even been to Eagle Mountain before...
After she made the exchange, she shot Mr. Fawles in the arm!
I watched my car from bridge. I never put no body in that car!

source.evidence_span: the witness wearing a scarf and a hat is standing near the broken end
source.testimony_span: N/A
source.explanation: The person that came first would be the one at the broken end of the bridge, which was the victim. So, the witness could not have arrived earlier than the victim.

testimony.testimony: So, I left Iris to help the acolyte, and returned to Hazakura Temple.
The stabbing I saw must have occurred after she was pushed out of her window.

source.evidence_span: Body fell 10 ft. after death.
source.testimony_span: The stabbing I saw must have occurred after she was pushed out of her window.
source.explanation: The autopsy report indicates that the fall happened after the victim was killed, so the stabbing could not have occured after the victim fell.

testimony.testimony: And when I awoke... Mystic Ami was... stabbing Mystic Elise through the back!
And there... I saw tracks! Tracks that indicated the snowmobile had been used!
I didn't see anyone at the bridge that night either!

source.evidence_span: N/A
source.testimony_span: I didn't see anyone at the bridge that night
source.explanation: The witness Larry Butz has seen Phoenix Wright that night.
source.context_span:
Phoenix:
D-Don't scare me like that, Larry! I almost had a heart attack!

Butz:
My name isn't Larry! It's Laurice!

Phoenix:
Larry, hurry up and call the police! I'm going to the Inner Temple!

Butz:
D-Don't be stupid! The bridge is nothing but a burning wreck right now!

testimony.testimony: I went to the shack at around 9, so it would have been about 10:30 PM...
Sketching! In front of the bridge! I was whipped up into a frenzy of art!
I'm sure that Iris was simply wearing a spare hood.

evidence_span: There is no crystal sphere attached.
The staff has a crystal sphere attached to it.
source.testimony_span: N/A
source.explanation: A crystal sphere is missing from the staff of the victim Elise Deauxnim.
